    • borrowItem

      public boolean borrowItem​(java.lang.String user1, java.lang.String user2, java.lang.String itemId, int threshold) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Performs the action of user1 borrowing an item from user2
      Parameters:
      user1 - the id of the user borrowing an item
      user2 - the id of the user lending the item
      itemId - the id of the item
      threshold - the value for how many items can be borrowed before starting to lend
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully borrowed
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - if the itemId or one of the two user IDs were not found.

    • lendItem

      public boolean lendItem​(java.lang.String user1, java.lang.String user2, java.lang.String itemId, int threshold) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Performs the action of user1 lending an item from user2
      Parameters:
      user1 - the id of the user lending an item
      user2 - the id of the user borrowing the item
      itemId - the id of the item
      threshold - the value for how many items can be borrowed before starting to lend
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully lent
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - if the itemId or one of the two user IDs were not found.

    • trade

      public java.lang.String trade​(java.lang.String user1, java.lang.String item1, java.lang.String user2, java.lang.String item2) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Performs the trade action between two users
      Parameters:
      user1 - the first user's id
      item1 - the id of the item that user1 will be giving to user2
      user2 - the second user's id
      item2 - the id of the item that user2 will be giving to user1
      Returns:
      user1's id
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - users / items not found
